name: Proto Tower 248
description: That last one had a huge mistake. I saved the png original in the images folder, so when I ran bulk_resize.py, the script didn't run on 247. So 247 has been deployed in it's original size of 64x64, which probably looks terrible on stargaze because the the front end probably stretches the pixels out instead of using nearest neigbor algorithm due to the cost of that algo. haha too bad because I basically spent the whole metadata file praising the background. I'll remake that one in color... maybe. I keep saying I'm going to remake stuff, but then I just endup making originals because it's more fun to just kick stuff from my head.

attributes.value: More Realistic and Close Up Than Previous Ones
